Module edu.ntnu.idatt1002.team20
Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.team20.models.debt

Class DebtRegister

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.team20.models.debt.DebtRegister
public class DebtRegister extends Object
Class for storing debts. Includes methods for adding, removing and getting debts, as well as the amount of debts.
